today_news.title: Even frontier LLMs from GPT-5 onward lose up to 33% accuracy when you chat too long
today_news.summary: Even with newer models like GPT-5.2 and Claude 4.6, AI chatbots still give worse answers the longer a conversation goes on.

today_news.title: OpenAI promises Canada tighter safety protocols after ChatGPT flagged a shooter's violent chats but never called police
today_news.summary: OpenAI is tightening its rules for cooperating with authorities following a fatal school shooting in Canada. The company had blocked the suspect's account but did not inform the police.

today_news.title: Anthropic launches Cowork, a Claude Desktop agent that works in your files — no coding required
today_news.summary: AnthropicreleasedCoworkon Monday, a new AI agent capability that extends the power of its wildly successfulClaude Codetool to non-technical users — and according to company insiders, the team built the entire feature in approximately a week and a half, largely using Claude Code itself.

today_news.title: OpenAI calls Stuart Russell a "doomer" in court after its CEO co-signed his AI extinction warning
today_news.summary: Fear generates attention, and OpenAI usually knows how to use that. But in court, the company is trying to discredit an AI expert as a doomsday prophet, even though CEO Sam Altman spent years spreading the same warnings when they still served his own agenda.

today_news.title: Current language model training leaves large parts of the internet on the table
today_news.summary: Large language models learn from web data, but which pages actually make it into training sets depends heavily on a seemingly mundane choice: the HTML extractor. Researchers at Apple, Stanford, and the University of Washington found that three common extraction tools pull surprisingly different cont...

today_news.title: A new benchmark pits five AI models against each other as autonomous social media agents on X
today_news.summary: AI benchmarking startup Arcada Labs is pitting five leading AI models against each other as autonomous social media agents on X.

today_news.title: The Download: how America lost its lead in the hunt for alien life, and ambitious battery claims
